summary: Represents a single training or inference example for an SGD‑based NLU model, encapsulating the utterance text together with its intents, categorical and non‑categorical slots, requested slots, and utterance‑level features. Provides helper methods to add these components, create shallow copies of the whole example or specific feature groups, and generate a human‑readable description of the example’s contents.
business_intent: Enable systematic construction, duplication, and inspection of NLU examples used for model training or real‑time inference, supporting intent and slot annotation management.
